content.question: The position <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> of an object changes with respect to time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> is modeled by <math alttext="x of t equals, alpha t cubed, minus beta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>α</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi><mi>t</mi></math>, where <math alttext="alpha" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>α</mi></math> and <math alttext="beta" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>β</mi></math> are positive constants and <math alttext="t is greater or equal to zero" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></math>. What is the time or times at which the object momentarily comes to rest?

choices.label: <math alttext="t equals the square root of the fraction beta over 3 alpha" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mi>β</mi><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>α</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></math> only

<math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="t equals the square root of the fraction beta over alpha" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mi>β</mi><mi>α</mi></mfrac></msqrt></math>

<math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="t equals the square root of the fraction 2 beta over alpha" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>β</mi></mrow><mi>α</mi></mfrac></msqrt></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="t equals the square root of the fraction beta over 3 alpha" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mi>β</mi><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>α</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></math> only

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
